Articles.Content: Found this and thought it was really interesting
Yea, I just saw it too. It was one of Nerdcubed's mystery videos. I get the impression that there is an incredibly high likelihood that that's how you were introduced to it.

Yea, I just saw it too. It was one of Nerdcubed's mystery videos. I get the impression that there is an incredibly high likelihood that that's how you were introduced to it.

Somebody at my work knows I'm a KSP junkie and thought I would like it ... they probably found it on reddit or something.

Ah, well I guessed it because the video (that Nerdcubed linked to this one from) was put up just two hours ago and Nerdcubed only has a million subscribers. I am sure there are several of his fans in various places on the forums. Anyway, I certainly like the video, it's the best demonstration I've ever seen of this model for gravitation.

Yus... NerdCubed.. love him. (No not like that)

He did go to college for like, a year for astrophysics, and he does like KSP so I can see liked this video.
